dimensions.name: Root Cause Accuracy
dimensions.explanation: The agent failed to identify the root cause related to CM and DDR causing VCORE frequency throttling.

dimensions.name: Causal Chain Completeness
dimensions.explanation: The agent did not capture the causal chain from CM to CPU to DDR to VCORE.

dimensions.name: Metric Precision
dimensions.explanation: The agent correctly identified some DDR and VCORE percentages but missed CPU frequencies.

dimensions.name: Reasoning Quality
dimensions.explanation: The reasoning was incomplete and did not logically rule out or identify MMDVFS as a cause.

dimensions.name: Actionability
dimensions.explanation: The suggested actions were basic and lacked specific historical fixes or recommendations.
